entries.boss_detected: Be on the lookout. A heavy fighter has been detected in your sector.
entries.complete: You have defeated your assigned targets. Excellent flying out there, pilot. Return to your commander for mission debriefing.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_1: They sent you out to do a man's work?
entries.dd_boss_taunt_2: Maybe you should have choosen a new profession.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_3: I will make you pay for everyone of my men you destroyed.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_4: You have caused enough trouble. It is time for you to die.
entries.dd_boss_taunt_5: You are indeed skilled, but that skill will not help you now.
entries.found_loc: We have discovered another cluster of enemy fighters that need to be cleared out. Proceed to nav location and begin the sweep and clear.
entries.level_boss: The heavy fighter has been eliminated. Nice job, pilot.
entries.level_boss_dead: The heavy fighter has been eliminated. Nice job, pilot.
entries.level_increase: Be careful, pilot. It looks like this set it better organized and trained then the last.
entries.quest_d: Velocity Mercenaries have begun increased operations in the Dantooine sector. They have even gone so far as to start attacking imperial convoys. Intelligence reports indicate that their numbers have grown to dangerous levels and need to controlled before they gain to much power in the sector.
entries.quest_destroy_d: Travel to the waypoint given to an area of high Velocity Mercenary density. Destroy all attacking waves in that area until you receive a new waypoint guiding you towards the next area.
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Dantooine system to begin duty mission of reducing the total number of Velocity Mercenaries in the area.
entries.targets_behind: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Warning! Enemy fighters detected incoming from the rear.>
entries.taunt_1: Our orders are to make sure you don't return alive.
entries.taunt_3: Feel the might of the Velocity.
entries.taunt_5: Make it easy on yourself, give up now.
entries.title: Dantooine System: Destroy the Velocity Mercenaries Duty
entries.title_d: Travel to the Dantooine system and destroy the Velocity mercenaries. Intelligence reports that they are massing into ever increasing numbers and Command wants those numbers reduced. The mission is a simple sweep and clear. You will travel to locations of high enemy density and clear those areas out with lethal force.
